items

Class ShipWeaponItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • items.Item
      • items.ShipWeaponItem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ShipUpgrade

    public class ShipWeaponItem
extends Item
implements ShipUpgrade
    Item subclass that implements ShipUpgrade and acts as a weapon that can be attached to a Ship object.
